actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XI of the Social Security Act to eliminate the provisions (which were added in 1972) with respect to professional standards review in the medicare and medicaid programs, and to require regular audits by the Government Accounting Office of all institutional providers under such programs.

summary.text: Requires regular audits by the Government Accounting Office of all institutional providers under the Social Security Act's Health Insurance for the Aged (Medicare) or Grants to States for Medical Assistance (Medicaid) Programs. (Repeals 42 U.S.C. 1320(c)(1)-(19))

titles.title: A bill to amend title XI of the Social Security Act to eliminate the provisions (which were added in 1972) with respect to professional standards review in the medicare and medicaid programs, and to require regular audits by the Government Accounting Office of all institutional providers under such programs.
